titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 25 percent investment tax credit for recycling equipment.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H269)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a 25 percent investment tax credit for recycling equipment.
